title: Wait For Me
description: Hot.Sexy.One of the most gorgeous male specimens I ever had the pleasure of setting my eyes on.I didnâ€™t want to resist him but knowing he was taken, I knew that I had to do what was right. My inner good girl insisted on it.Deep down however, I knew the truth. When shove comes to push, will I turn away from this handsome man?Most say that patience is a virtue but for how long will I let myself wait?
